message.body: Brother, send us your wife's phone number. Kathy misses interacting with Rose now that Rose has given up Facebook.
Thanks
Rose wants Kathy's number as well. She says she promises she'll put it in her phone this time.
How's your family?
Good, yours? Heard you got a van.
Happy Easter.
Everyone here has a stomach bug. Slowly getting over it.
We did get a van. Still in the process of building it up. It's already making a difference.
Does it have one of those porthole windows?
Eh?
ï¿¼
Nope. This will be a surf van conversion. No creepy flower pattern curtains here.
You know, like the child molesters drive around in.
Ahh, too many windows for abduction.
The long term goal is to convert it to 4x4
It is getting a roof rack with a bolt on roof top tent
http://www.tepuitents.com/ that one in particular.
Audacious. I was about to ask if you were popping the top.

Rose wanted an RV, but we don't have somewhere to keep it, and RV's aren't good for beach trips. Instead we are converting the van. Next week I am taking it over to Wes's house to weld up a cage for the back with some shelving and a pull out kitchen built
Sounds like something Wes would be in to.
Yep.
Although, if you got an RV, you wouldn't need to park it where you are now renting. You could stop renting a house altogether and just live in the RV.
Not a bad idea.
Visit the occasional campground to empty the sewage, but otherwise just sleep in Walmart parking lots
Receive all your mail at Wes's house.
Trapped in an RV days on end with a bunch of kids...
I might take fingernail removal above that.
You could always get a houseboat too...
Then transfer back and forth between houseboat and RV.
Leave kids on the boat and I take the RV. Sounds good
